title: Episode 3: Stereotype Threat
description: Annie Duke was often the only woman at the poker table, which influenced the way people saw her, and the way she saw herself. Feeling like an outsider can come at a cost, but also can be an advantage.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
